EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Chicago_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place on Tuesday the 2nd of May at 1871. We look forward to seeing you soon.
Date: Tuesday, May 23, 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
1871 theMART, 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza #1212, Chicago, IL 60654 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/search/theMART,+222+W+Merchandise+Mart+Plaza+%231212,+Chicago,+IL+60654/@41.8883935,-87.6376,17z?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
